1.Name: unknown
1.Text: It seems we have a new visitor here...

2.Name: unknown
2.Text: Ah! Where are my manners. Let me introduce myself first...

3.Name: bb
3.Text: I am BB short for Big Brother. I can see anything and everything that happens in this world!

4.Name: bb
4.Text: I will help you in this journey of yours. What journey you ask? Hehehe, let's not spoil that so soon shall we?

5.Name: bb
5.Text: And now you are asking why am I helping you?

6.Name: bb
6.Text: Hmm... Aren't you a curious one. Let's start the journey first shall we? Your questions would be answered in due time. Good Luck!

1.Name: bb
1.Text: It seems some sort of error has occured...

2.Name: bb
2.Text: You haven't done something stupid now. Have you?
